task.summary: Default task
mod_newxss : set structures to pass to permenantxss module
mod_newxss : renamed to mod_xss (replace the old one)
mod_newxss : removed reference in attack.py (list of modules)
Remove mod_oldxss.py file + more control on KeyboardInterrupt (can continue the current attack)
Fixed logo (pycharm encoding issue ? Don't know) - Fixed mods backup and buster (payloads attribute was overwritten) - New output format for mod_permenantxss - Fix base href parsing in crawker.py

Remove the attack_get/attack_post mechanism, modules must now override attack(). Updated output format for modules backup, crlf, delay, htaccess, nikto mod_crlf now use the mutation engine when a Request is send() its status property is changed to get http status code

Fix mutator: attacks should be memorized between 2 mutate() + Catch RequestExceptions in several atatck modules so we can count them and ask later for how to behave (currently waiting halt a sec on connection issues)
Modules improvement: in the current model each original request that is mutated should be yielded back to wapiti.py to be marked as attacked (persister needs to be improved to keep attacks)
Mod_exec : forget to reactivate it on defaults
wapiti: scan and attack attempts are now "persisted" in a SQLite3 file. -i and -k options are currently broken. Successful attacks will be stored too later, report will be generated from stored data.
wapiti: report is now generated from vulnerabilities/anomalies stored in the persister (sqlite3 db)
report: new HTML report generator using Mako templating engine
report: removed old HTML report generator

New wapiti-getcookie to replace bold old and wapiti-cookie Wapiti : fixed verbose 0 behavior, no SSL verification on default, SOCKS5 support is back, more infos about session on runtime Modules : builtin list of parameters to not attack setup : added PySocks to dependancies
Removed old cookie utilities
Renamed new cookie utility
Wapiti: --skip option to skip parameters during attack
Session file names now include the scope + part of the md5 hash of the root URL
Session file names use complete root_url for hash part

Crawler state (variables) are saved to pickle file per session Wapiti: added option to discard sending crash reports New Explorer class : explore() is now out of the Crawler class Wapiti: new discovered URLs are commited one at a time
Renamed some options

Fixed a bug in mod_nikto (python2 to 3 issue) Persister: fixed a bug with file upload parameters Moved main code of wapiti and wapiti-getcookie to new package wapitiCore.main Added "entry_points" section to setup.py to provide easy access to commands at install Changed dev status from pre-alpha to beta :)

Setup: lxml can be opt-out with --with-html5lib, that will allow installation without compiling anything wapiti: changed --qs-limit option with -S --scan-force option + more clever mechanism. Available option values should sound familiar ;-)

language: fix language extraction on windows wapiti: added some metavar to usage message + --max-parameters option reports: improve several generators doc: updated readme and install files html reports: updated js and css dependancies
Removed unnecessary resource files
Mise à jour des changelogs, mise à jour des manpages, mise à jour des .pot
Reviewed TODOs in code, some will be postponed. Generated .mo files.
Changed website for collecting crash reports
Fixed setup, removed old lines for frozen check, fixed some minor PEP8 issues (import order)
Update README.md
Complete en.po file (in order to be used on other projects)
Fixed HTML report template for anomalies
Updated example.txt / Fix on jsoncookie / Removed requests version in dependencies
Updated README.md with more URLs
Fixed Nikto references in HTML report
Two new wapiti options, copyright date update, easters, updated language files and manpages, added FAQ, changed status to stable
Updated setup + install.md
Official release of version 3.0.0
Fixed typos in french translations
Added module to scan for interesting HTTP methods (PUT, COPY, DELETE, LOCK, MOVE, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH, UNLOCK, etc)
Fixed issue #54 Exception - Firing Range Testsite, was a bug in lamejs that let's None values goes in the list of extracted possible links
Reworked on XSS and permanent-XSS modules to greatly reduce false positives. XSS payloads can now be found in an ini-like file.
More fixes and improvements on XSS and permanent XSS modules towards better results
Changed URL for bug reporting
Changed some XSS payloads to something more visualizable
mod_methods: optional module by default
Here is the very first version of a new mod_ssrf module
Last fix for mod_ssrf / Changed version to 3.0.1 / Updated setup, ChangeLog, README and INSTALL
Some modifications/improvements for Windows LFI payloads

MESSAGE.value: Reviewed TODOs in code, some will be postponed. Generated .mo files.
Changed website for collecting crash reports
Fixed setup, removed old lines for frozen check, fixed some minor PEP8 issues (import order)
Update README.md
Complete en.po file (in order to be used on other projects)

Two new wapiti options, copyright date update, easters, updated language files and manpages, added FAQ, changed status to stable

Official release of version 3.0.0
Fixed typos in french translations
Added module to scan for interesting HTTP methods (PUT, COPY, DELETE, LOCK, MOVE, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH, UNLOCK, etc)
Fixed issue #54 Exception - Firing Range Testsite, was a bug in lamejs that let's None values goes in the list of extracted possible links
Reworked on XSS and permanent-XSS modules to greatly reduce false positives. XSS payloads can now be found in an ini-like file.
Fixes and improvements on XSS and permanent XSS modules. No more use of lxml, switched to html5lib. Permanent XSS module currently reports vulns twice. Refactoring still to do.
More fixes and improvements on XSS and permanent XSS modules towards better results
Changed URL for bug reporting
Changed some XSS payloads to something more visualizable
mod_methods: optional module by default
Here is the very first version of a new mod_ssrf module
Last fix for mod_ssrf / Changed version to 3.0.1 / Updated setup, ChangeLog, README and INSTALL
Some modifications/improvements for Windows LFI payloads
Added pipenv + tests folder
